All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccountScreen
Account screen that allows the user to see what their username and uuid is, and logout.
AppController
 
Board
This class represents a 9x9 quoridor board with walls and regular tiles and can be treated as such.
BoardOnClick
Simple interface that handles when a wall and tile are clicked on the corresponding QuoridorBoard element.
constants
Simple static class the holds the server URL and URI.
ErrorOutputter
Interface for responding to errors within volley request, used primarily by the GameNet, and the LobbyNet.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
fragment
 
gameChat
Game chat.
gameChatFragment
Game chat fragment?
GameNet
Class that implements all of the server side API calls for the main game.
gameScreen
Controller class for main game screen.
leaderboard
Leaderboard screen.
LoadingController
Interface for showing and hiding loading notification for UI blocking elements.
Lobby
Class that handles a networked game lobby with the server.
LobbyNet
Class that implements all of the server side API calls for the lobby.
LobbyPreselectionScreen
Lobby preselection screen that allows the user to choose which type of game they would like to start.
LobbyScreen
Lobby screen that allows the users to wait for a game to start.
LoginScreen
Login activity that negotiates login or registration with the backend, and forward to the account screen upon completion.
MainGame
Controller for a network-enabled quoridor game.
MainGameHistoryUi
 
Player
Object that represents a player for the main game.
Player
Player model used by QuoridorBoard custom UI element
QuoridorBoard
Custom Quoridor Board ui element.
RequestController
App-wide request controller used for volley.
RequestListener
Interface for responding to volley request made through the VolleyListener class.
StartScreen
Start screen navigation activity that has buttons for Start Game - Going to lobby preselection screen. Account - Going to the login screen or the account view. Leaderboard - Going to the leaderboard screen. Settings - Going to the settings screen. Exit - Exits the game.
Tile
Object that represents a tile object for the game board.
Tile
Simple Tile model, primarily used to interact with QuoridorBoard view.
VolleyListener
Listener for creating Volley data requests.
Wall
Simple Wall model, primarily used to interact with QuoridorBoard view.
